name: Shoppe Keep 2 Character Creator Preview
description: Jump into a preview of Shoppe Keep 2's whimsical character creator! Download now and receive an exclusive Golden Keeper outfit for your character in Shoppe Keep 2 when it launches!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
